author: joshsteeples
title: Where to buy reasonably priced Pagri in Delhi?
text: India Mike » India Travel » Cities in India » Delhi » Where to buy reasonably priced Pagri in Delhi? Where to buy reasonably priced Pagri in Delhi? # 1 Hello all, I am looking to buy a few Pagri / turbans as gifts for some relatives home in the UK. Where is a good place to buy nice Pagri in New Delhi? My budget would be 500-1000 per piece. I would like something embellished if possible, like in the link. Would chandi chowk be the best bet? Thanks
